backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling user profiles, mod creation, and file updates with authorization and basic validation.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old mod and profile data to the new schema with added prompt and gameName fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files and components involved in new mod-creation workflow updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including routes, components, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout, and mounts pages including mod creation and viewing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a display name and saving it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication gate component that blocks access to protected pages until the user signs in.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component providing header, navigation with auth actions, main content area, and footer for the app.
frontend/src/components/mods/FileCompose: UI for uploading, creating, listing, and removing mod files with validation and file count limits.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModEditorFo: Form for editing mod metadata with live validation for title, version, description, and prompt.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModShareLin: Displays an unlisted share link for a mod and allows copying it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for user profiles and mod CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/fileLimits.ts: Provides file upload limits and validation utilities, including size formatting.
frontend/src/lib/unlisted.ts: Generates 32‑char unlisted IDs and constructs share URLs based on window origin.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Includes validation helpers for mod metadata fields like title, game name, version, description, and prompt.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user's mods with loading states and management links within an authenticated dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public marketing landing page with hero content, features, and onboarding links.
frontend/src/pages/ModCreateWizardPage.t: Implements a multi‑step authenticated wizard for creating a mod, validating inputs, uploading files, and generating an unlisted ID.
frontend/src/pages/ModManagePage.tsx: Provides an authenticated interface to view mod details and update its files with validation and save actions.
frontend/src/pages/PublicModPage.tsx: Displays a public mod page fetched by unlisted ID, showing metadata and allowing file downloads with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, redirects authenticated users, and triggers profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the mod‑sharing website.
